body:
Hey I'm Kenner390 but you can call me Kenner. I'm new on these servers and I'd like to meet all of you. In this topic, I'd like that you ask me questions and I'll answer as soon as possible.

Lets start asking me some questions! ;')

title: Kenner390 AMA

replies.body: Hello there, welcome to the Avicus Network! Do read the rules here . What's your favourite food?
replies.body_tagged: Hello there, welcome to the Avicus Network! Do read the rules here . What's your favourite food?

replies.body:
Favourite food... So I think pizza, It's :3

I love pizza but I'm not fat

I rode the rules anyways
